StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: proc_markcard_std_ranking
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE proc_markcard_std_ranking ( pschool_code IN VARCHAR2, pbatch_no IN DATE, pclass_code IN VARCHAR2, pstream_code IN VARCHAR2, pterm_code IN VARCHAR2, pstudent_id IN VARCHAR2, pmaximum_rank IN VARCHAR2 DEFAULT '20', pstd_rank IN OUT VARCHAR2 ) AS ---cursor student ranking CURSOR cur_std_ranking ( p_school_code VARCHAR2, p_batch_no DATE, p_class_code VARCHAR2, p_stream_code VARCHAR2, p_term_code VARCHAR2, p_student_id VARCHAR2, p_maximum_rank VARCHAR2 ) IS SELECT ( CASE WHEN overall_status = 'PASSED' THEN func_num_ordinal(ranking) ELSE NULL END ) AS ranking FROM mv_std_ranking WHERE ranking <= TO_NUMBER(p_maximum_rank) AND school_code = p_school_code AND batch_no = p_batch_no AND class_code = p_class_code AND stream_code = p_stream_code AND term_code = p_term_code AND student_id = p_student_id; BEGIN OPEN cur_std_ranking(p_school_code => pschool_code, p_batch_no => pbatch_no, p_class_code => pclass_code, p_stream_code => pstream_code, p_term_code => pterm_code, p_student_id => pstudent_id, p_maximum_rank => pmaximum_rank); FETCH cur_std_ranking INTO pstd_rank; CLOSE cur_std_ranking; END;
